import React from "react"; import { useFormik } from "formik"; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import classes from "../Form/form.module.css"; const FormAdvertisement = () => { const formik = useFormik({ initialValues: { VerifiedVin: false, brand: "", model: "", price_at: "", price_to: "", region: "", type: "", year_at: "", year_to: "", }, onSubmit: (values) => { console.log(values); }, }); return ( {/*
Type of vehicle Brand Model
Region Year Price
*/} ); }; export default FormAdvertisement;
